title: Jose Mourinho leaves fans in stitches as he makes timely assessment of Victor Lindelof
text:
Former United boss criticised Lindelof's ability in the air before Sunday's game

Jose Mourinho left fans in stitches after criticising Victor Lindelof's aerial ability just moments before he was seen missing a header during Sunday's warm-up.

Mourinho had been the one to bring Lindelof to the club, signing him for £31million from Benfica in the summer of 2017.

The former United boss kept faith with the Swede as he made a slow start to life at Old Trafford but now believes there are fundamental problems in his game.

Jose Mourinho made timely assessment of Victor Lindelof before Sunday's game at West Ham

"Last pre-season I was crying for a centre-defender!" 🤣



Jose Mourinho and Roy Keane agree that Manchester United 'had' to buy Harry Maguire but say there is no doubt he improves their defence.



Watch Super Sunday live on Sky Sports PL now: https://t.co/doDg3kbhBI pic.twitter.com/X6w5rQIPC0 — Sky Sports Premier League (@SkySportsPL) September 22, 2019

Mourinho, who was sacked by United last December, believes the club had no option but to spend big on Harry Maguire as he has the attributes Lindelof is missing.

'Lindelof is very, very good in some aspects of the game,' he told Sky Sports. 'But he can be bullied in one-on-ones in the box and he's not especially good in the air.

'Maguire has that presence and those physical qualities, and that is very important.'

It proved to be a timely assessment of the United defender, who was shown seconds later missing a header unchallenged in the warm-up before their game against West Ham.

Moments after Mourinho's comments, Lindelof was seen going up for header during warm-up

Despite being uncontested, the United defender managed to completely miss the ball

Fans took to Twitter to joke about the timing of Mourinho's comments. One fan wrote: The absolute best part of this clip - not a second after Mourinho says Lindelof is not great in the air... Lindeof whiffs on an uncontested free header on a ball being lobbed to him in the warm-up.'

Another added: 'Mourinho talking about Lindelof: 'He's not especially good in the air.' I'm not sure if that was edited, but my goodness, talk about timing.'

One fan criticised the Portuguese boss for attacking Lindelof when he was the one who signed him, saying: 'The irony that Mourinho is slamming Lindelof . Hang on... didn't that moaner sign him?'

Mourinho on Lindelof:



Talk about perfect timing. 😂😂😂😂pic.twitter.com/1YvoXlAXnl — UTFR 🇾🇪 (@ManUtd_HQ) September 22, 2019
description: Jose Mourinho left fans in stitches after criticising Victor Lindelof's aerial ability just moments before he was seen missing a header during Sunday's warm-up.
